TestCase.description: Verify on clicking Add contact, System displays the provision to input data

TestStep.Message: Forgot password? Click here is Displayed
Type 'hatcher1298@gmail.com' in: Email Address Textbox in Login Form
Type 'Indium@123' in: Password Textbox in Login Form
Click on: Login Button in Login Form
List Of Sidebar Button is displayed
Add New Listing is validated and clicked
Add New Listing Dialog Box is displayed
Successfully navigate to Add New Listing Page
Add Listing Close button is displayed
Click on: Add Listing Close button

TestCase.description: Verify Salutation field in the Add contact page has default value as per design.
